Element.Name: Addon
Element.Description: Represents an add-on in an input group

Property.Name: ButtonSize
Property.Description: Gets or sets the button size

Property.Name: ButtonType
Property.Description: Gets or sets the button type

Property.Name: IsBlock
Property.Description: Gets or sets a value to determine if the button should act as a block element. That is, if it should span the full width of its parent.

Property.Name: IsSubmit
Property.Description: Gets or sets a value to determine if the button should act as a form submit button.
